reviewText:
French TV does not regard golf as being of any interest, so heaven knows what sort of coverage, if any, there will be for the Ryder Cup 2018.
So for me this was catch-up time in the glorious countryside of central Scotland, an area I have known sine my 'teens, I am now in the 'autumn of my years', but the course is so changed since I played golf there to be unrecogizable, but what an occassion. WOW.....
great dvd i love sports and golf.
enjoyed reliving the competition.  Outstanding performances by the Europeans/  prompt, efficient service/ thanks!
